content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":16341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あぁ。あのお嬢さんに隠されちゃったからね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah. Because that young lady hid it from me.\""},{"lineNumber":16342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行こうとしてるって……気づかれたかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe she realized I was trying to leave...\""},{"lineNumber":16343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は……っ、わかりやすい、からな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re... so easy to read...\""},{"lineNumber":16344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's alright."},{"lineNumber":16345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エスクードソードがあれば、何とかなるさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as I have the Escudo Sword, I'll manage.\""},{"lineNumber":16346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「セシルともうお別れなのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Parting ways with Cecil already..."},{"lineNumber":16347,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し、寂しいけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"...makes me a little lonely.\""},{"lineNumber":16348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah......\""},{"lineNumber":16349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":16350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":16351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は……その。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... well."},{"lineNumber":16352,"originalJapaneseLine":"　秩序の乱れた街を……守って欲しいと、","translatedEnglishLine":"I've been asked to protect the city where order has broken down..."},{"lineNumber":16353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　依頼を受けている……から、な……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...that’s why I must go.\""},{"lineNumber":16354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。わかってる……セシルは傭兵だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. I understand... Cecil is a mercenary."},{"lineNumber":16355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無理は言えないさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't ask for the impossible.\""},{"lineNumber":16356,"originalJapaneseLine":"（でも……でも、本当は、アリオス……！","translatedEnglishLine":"(But... but the truth is, Arios...!"},{"lineNumber":16357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は、お前と……っ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to be with you...!)"},{"lineNumber":16358,"originalJapaneseLine":"（そう……言うべき、か……？","translatedEnglishLine":"(Is that... what I should say...?"},{"lineNumber":16359,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも、っ……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"But...!)"},{"lineNumber":16360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいですかね、いい加減。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't it about time already?"},{"lineNumber":16361,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人を待たせている自覚はあるんですか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you realize you're keeping people waiting,"},{"lineNumber":16362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　馬鹿アリオス」","translatedEnglishLine":"you idiot Arios?\""},{"lineNumber":16363,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……ごめんな、コーラ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... sorry, Kola."},{"lineNumber":16364,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ…………行くよ。そろそろ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then... let's go. It's about time...\""},{"lineNumber":16365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":16366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……セシル？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Cecil?\""},{"lineNumber":16367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........\""},{"lineNumber":16368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、その、っ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-those... um...\""},{"lineNumber":16369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じ、自由都市に……また、来い……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-come back to the Free City... again...!"},{"lineNumber":16370,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それまで、次に来るまでは、私が……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Until then, until you come again, I will...!\""},{"lineNumber":16371,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah."},{"lineNumber":16372,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セシルが守ってくれるなら……安心だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"As long as Cecil is protecting it... I can feel at ease.\""},{"lineNumber":16373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":16374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁあ。寄り道の多さじゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haah. With so many detours,"},{"lineNumber":16375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　歴代でもなかなかのものですよ、アリオスは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Arios really takes the cake even among all those before him...\""},{"lineNumber":16376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":16377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………また…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Again...\""},{"lineNumber":16378,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は……たぶん。","translatedEnglishLine":"I... probably."},{"lineNumber":16379,"originalJapaneseLine":"言うべき言葉を、間違えたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Said the wrong words I should have said."},{"lineNumber":16380,"originalJapaneseLine":"待っていればいつか、なんて。","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking that 'if I wait, someday...'"},{"lineNumber":16381,"originalJapaneseLine":"約束があるから大丈夫、なんて。","translatedEnglishLine":"Or that 'it's okay because we have a promise.'"},{"lineNumber":16382,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな風に、覚悟も決めずに……","translatedEnglishLine":"Without making up my mind like that..."},{"lineNumber":16383,"originalJapaneseLine":"決断を、行動を、先送りにしていたのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I was putting off decisions and actions."},{"lineNumber":16384,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから…………アリオスは、変わり。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's why... Arios changed."},{"lineNumber":16385,"originalJapaneseLine":"変わった事の、","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason for that change,"},{"lineNumber":16386,"originalJapaneseLine":"その要因から救ってやることも出来なかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I couldn't save him from that cause."},{"lineNumber":16387,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、私も…………","translatedEnglishLine":"And I too..."},{"lineNumber":16388,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ん……………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm...)"},{"lineNumber":16389,"originalJapaneseLine":"（いかん、眠っていたか……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh no, was I asleep...?"},{"lineNumber":16390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ベンチで一休み、と思っていたが……）","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought I was just taking a short rest on the bench...)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ。あのお嬢さんに隠されちゃったからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah. Because that young lady hid it from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行こうとしてるって……気づかれたかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she realized I was trying to leave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は……っ、わかりやすい、からな……」
エスクードソードがあれば、何とかなるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as I have the Escudo Sword, I'll manage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「セシルともうお別れなのは……
秩序の乱れた街を……守って欲しいと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been asked to protect the city where order has broken down...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 依頼を受けている……から、な……」
「うん。わかってる……セシルは傭兵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. I understand... Cecil is a mercenary.
I can't ask for the impossible."
I want to be with you...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人を待たせている自覚はあるんですか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you realize you're keeping people waiting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ…………行くよ。そろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... let's go. It's about time..."
"C-come back to the Free City... again...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで、次に来るまでは、私が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, until you come again, I will...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルが守ってくれるなら……安心だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as Cecil is protecting it... I can feel at ease."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歴代でもなかなかのものですよ、アリオスは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios really takes the cake even among all those before him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うべき言葉を、間違えたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said the wrong words I should have said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていればいつか、なんて。
約束があるから大丈夫、なんて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or that 'it's okay because we have a promise.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな風に、覚悟も決めずに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without making up my mind like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決断を、行動を、先送りにしていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was putting off decisions and actions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから…………アリオスは、変わり。
その要因から救ってやることも出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't save him from that cause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベンチで一休み、と思っていたが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I was just taking a short rest on the bench...)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あぁ。あのお嬢さんに隠されちゃったからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah. Because that young lady hid it from me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行こうとしてるって……気づかれたかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe she realized I was trying to leave..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は……っ、わかりやすい、からな……」
エスクードソードがあれば、何とかなるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as I have the Escudo Sword, I'll manage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「セシルともうお別れなのは……
秩序の乱れた街を……守って欲しいと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been asked to protect the city where order has broken down...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 依頼を受けている……から、な……」
「うん。わかってる……セシルは傭兵だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. I understand... Cecil is a mercenary.
I can't ask for the impossible."
I want to be with you...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人を待たせている自覚はあるんですか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you realize you're keeping people waiting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ…………行くよ。そろそろ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... let's go. It's about time..."
"C-come back to the Free City... again...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまで、次に来るまでは、私が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, until you come again, I will...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルが守ってくれるなら……安心だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As long as Cecil is protecting it... I can feel at ease."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios really takes the cake even among all those before him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うべき言葉を、間違えたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said the wrong words I should have said.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていればいつか、なんて。
約束があるから大丈夫、なんて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or that 'it's okay because we have a promise.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな風に、覚悟も決めずに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without making up my mind like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決断を、行動を、先送りにしていたのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was putting off decisions and actions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから…………アリオスは、変わり。
その要因から救ってやることも出来なかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn't save him from that cause.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベンチで一休み、と思っていたが……）
